missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the keyword-based content policy block that prevents AI video generation when prompts contain adult/sexual terms (e.g., "sex"), so generation proceeds normally and no prohibited-content toast is shown.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows contentPolicy utilities now always return false, but the AiStudioPage.tsx changes are truncated and do not show removal of any callsites (e.g., containsBlockedContent checks) or removal of the prohibited-content error toast in the video generation flow.

missing_requirements.reason: No explicit UI/copy changes are visible in the provided truncated AiStudioPage.tsx snippet, and contentPolicy.ts only provides generic messages without showing where/if existing prohibitive wording in the Video Generation card was removed.
